\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath,quantikz}

\tikzset{
    selectctrl/.style={
        draw,
        circle,
        minimum width=3.5pt,
        inner sep=2.5pt,
        append after command={
            \pgfextra {
                \filldraw[fill=white, color=white] (0, 0)-- (45:3.5pt) arc (45:225:3.5pt) -- cycle;
                \fill (0, 0)-- (45:3.5pt) arc (45:-135:3.5pt) -- cycle;
            }
        }
    }
}

\begin{document}
\begin{quantikz}
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & \midstick[4,brackets=none]{=} & |[selectctrl]| & \midstick[4,brackets=none]{=} & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & & |[selectctrl]| & & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ctrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & & |[selectctrl]| & & \octrl{1} & \ctrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & \gate{R_P}\wire[u][3]{q} & & \gate{R_P}\wire[u][3]{q} & & \gate{R_P(\alpha_0)} & \gate{R_P(\alpha_1)} & \gate{R_P(\alpha_2)} & \ \ldots \ & \gate{R_P(\alpha_7)} &
\end{quantikz}
\end{document}
